title: While walking my dog along Snows Cut path in CB Sunday April 12 mid-afternoon I saw two large black sailing ships go by. They looked like historic replicas.   I believe they were 3-masters but were not under sail.  Any idea what these were?  I have a picture taken from a distance if you would like to see it.  Thank you.  Mary
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/04/what-were-those-black-sailing-ships-in-snows-cut-on-april-12/
